resources.string: BRITISH ICONS. GLOBAL LEGENDS. The stunning Bonneville line-up each have their own unique authentic character and truly modern performance. The iconic Bonneville T120, T120 Black,T100 and T100 Black, the fun and accessible Street Twin, Street Scrambler and Street Cup. The ultimate caf√© racing Thruxton and Thruxton R. The beautiful Bonneville Bobber. And now introducing the new darker, meaner Bobber Black and the Bonneville Speedmaster - a true British classic custom with superior laid-back riding style
